Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.question: Which of the following is the most appropriate use of photography or video in the assessment of peripheral facial paralysis (PFP)?
question.option_a: To capture the patient's facial expressions during a conversation to observe symmetry
question.option_b: To document the patient's facial movements while they are at rest to compare with active movements
question.option_c: To record the patient's facial reactions to different tastes to assess taste function
question.option_d: To film the patient's eye movements to check for nystagmus
